message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. How about $105?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $108?
